system_url.title: System URL
system_url.description: The base URL of the External System API. For example, https://api.github.com

api_call_headers.title: API Call Headers
api_call_headers.description: Pass all the headers required to make API calls as a JSON object. e.g. {"api-key" : "<API Key value>"}

api_call_params.title: API Call Params
api_call_params.description: Pass all the headers required to make API calls as a JSON object. e.g. {"format" : "client_credentials"}

application_name.title: Application Name
application_name.description: The name of the Application CR where the REST APIS should be registered for consumption
